plugin_short_info: MT Text Converter is basically a Modder Hub plugin that can help you to convert Base64 to text , Base16 to text , Unicode to text, and more you can check... And  there is available for reverse function also like text to base64 etc...
plugin_long_info:
MT Text Converter is a powerful Modder Hub plugin that can help you to convert :-
* Base64 <==> Text 
* Base32 <==> Text
* Base16 <==> Text

* Unicode to Text =>> Ex. Unicode Text "MT \u0B2E\u0B4D\u0B5F\u0B3E\u0B28\u0B47\u0B1C\u0B30" to Normal Text "MT ‡¨Æ‡≠ç‡≠ü‡¨æ‡¨®‡≠á‡¨ú‡¨∞" // Third Party text

* Hex to Text ==> Ex. Hex Text "4D54204D616E61676572" (No Need Space) to Normal Text "Modder Hub"

* Binary to Text ==> Ex. Binary Text "01001101 01010100 00100000 01001101 01100001 01101110 01100001 01100111 01100101 01110010" (Need Space) to Normal Text "Modder Hub"

* Octal to Text ==> Ex. Octal Text "115 124 40 115 141 156 141 147 145 162" (Need Space) to Normal Text "Modder Hub"

* Ascii to Text ==>> Ex. Ascii Text "77 84 32 77 97 110 97 103 101 114"(Need Space) to Normal Text "Modder Hub"

* Morse code to Text ==>> Ex. Morse Text "-- --- -.. -.. . .-. / .... ..- -..." to normal text "Modder Hub"

* Zalgo Text to Text ==>> Ex. Zalgo Text "MÃöÃãÃöÕÉÃèÃ°oÕ†ÕçÕôÃ≠dÃÇÕ¶ÃµÕîdÃëÃåÃºÕâÕïÃ£ÃñÕöÃ†eÃåÃÖÃîÕ¶ÃäÕåÕäÃ≥ÕÖÃ≠ÃπÕìÕâÃÆrÕßÕóÃ°ÕöÕâÃóÃó ÕíÃãÕãÃ®HÃÜÕ•ÃçÃæÕ®ÕõÕöÃ•ÃûuÃìÕ¶ÃïÃ≥ÕïbÃÜÃáÃèÃäÃÅÕÆÃàÃ∂ÃúÃ¶ÃÆÕéÕìÃ¶" to Normal Text "Modder Hub"

* Wingding to Text ==>> Ex. Wingding Text "üí£‚ùÑ üí£‚úå‚ò†‚úå‚òù‚òú‚òº" to Normal Text "Modder Hub"

* Rot-13 to Text ==>> Ex. Rot-13 Text "ZG Znantre" to Normal Text "Modder Hub"

* Current Millis (You can Convert 1841196b400L{Smali Milli Second Hex} to current date Method)
 and also you can convert Date 2022-10-26 to Milli Seconds and Smali Milli Second hex (Ex 1841196b400L). Test and see more information about it.
 
* Color converter (Convert to integer and vice versa) ==> (Ex. #ff00ffff) to 
integer (Ex. -16711681)

*  AES Encryption and Decryption . You can use this for encrypt and decrypt your text in AES with custom key ... For editing key you have to go to the preference manager of MT Text Converter(Default key is Modder Hub)

* MD5, SHA-1, SHA-286 , SHA-384 and SHA-512 converter.. You only can encrypt the text but not vice versa because these are cryptographic (one-way) hash function and reversible not possible..

* Base58 , you can convert text to Base58 and vice-versa.

*  Base91 , Text <==> Base91

* Caesar, Text <==> Caeser

* Abtash , Text <==> Abtash

*  Ascii85/Base85 , Text <==> Ascii85/Base85

* Baconian  , Text <==> Baconian Text

* Beaufort , Text <==> Beaufort  text (N.B : This is one key Encryption and Decryption. So for editing key plz go to preference Manager of Base Converter then here you have to edit the password. Default password is "Modder Hub")

* Vigenere , Text <==> Vigenere text (N.B : This one also one  key decryption and Encryption so edit in preference manager)

* Blowfish , Text <==> Blowfish text (N.B This is also belongs to one key Encryption and Decryption so edit key in preference manager)


Thank you ‚ù§Ô∏è and Radhe Radhe to all.
